items.todoItem: Know that when Jesus comes again we shall be like Him.
Purify yourself to be like Christ because of the hope that is in you.
Know that Jesus was manifested to take away our sins.
Know that in Jesus is no sin.
Know that Jesus came to destroy the works of the devil.
Do not marvel when the world hates you.
Do not love in word but in deed and in truth.
Know that when we please Him we receive everything we ask of Him.
Do the things that are pleasing in His sight.
Believe on the name of Jesus Christ.
Love one another as Jesus commanded.
Know that He abides in you by the Holy Spirit which He has given you.
